info.description: This is the API server for RaptorChat.
info.title: RaptorChat API

post.description: Creates a new room with the current user as the owner

get.description: Returns details for a specific room

put.description: Updates a room's details (only group rooms can be updated)

400.description: Invalid request body or not a group room

delete.description: Deletes a room (only the owner can delete)

400.description: Invalid room ID or bad request

post.description: Creates a new message in a room and broadcasts it via Centrifugo
post.summary: Send a message to a room

get.description: Returns all users who are members of a specific room
Returns the number of users in a specific room
get.summary: Get user count in a room

delete.description: Deletes a message by ID and notifies all subscribers through Centrifugo

parameters.description: Message resource with ID to delete
parameters.name: resource

get.description: Returns all calls associated with the specified room
get.summary: Get calls for a specific room

200.description: List of calls for the room

post.description: Joins an existing active call in the room or creates a new one if none exists
post.summary: Join or create a call in a room

post.description: User leaves the active call in the room; call is ended if this is the last participant
post.summary: Leave or end a call in a room

get.description: Retrieves all non-deleted messages from a specific room

200.description: List of messages in the room

post.description: Assigns the moderator role to a user in a specific room
post.summary: Designate user as a room moderator

parameters.description: User ID to designate as moderator
parameters.name: userID

403.description: Forbidden - only room owner can designate moderators

get.description: Returns all roles the authenticated user has in a specific room
get.summary: Get current user's roles in a room

get.description: Retrieves the direct message conversation between the authenticated user and specified recipient
get.summary: Get direct message conversation with another user

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid recipient ID or User ID not found in context

get.description: Returns a list of all users in the system except the authenticated user
Returns the ID of the currently authenticated user
Retrieves the authenticated user's 5 most recent messages and calls

400.description: User ID not found in context

post.description: Accepts a multipart/form-data file upload for the authenticated user's avatar, stores it, and updates the user's record

400.description: Bad form data or missing file

delete.description: Deletes the authenticated user's avatar file and clears the URL in the database

get.description: Returns a list of friends (other users) for the currently authenticated user
get.summary: Get friends of the authenticated user

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's password, verifying the old password first

get.description: Returns all chat rooms belonging to the authenticated user
get.summary: List rooms of the current user

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's username and publishes an event via Centrifugo

get.description: Returns the user object for the specified user ID
Returns all pending invites sent to the specified user
get.summary: Get pending invites for a user
